::FZ/Lavacons/Perndabot/Rex/Proto/Kluster::

FZ fires two missiles as the firewall comes up. The missiles 
penetrate, the blue glow around them protecting them. They hit the 
shields and explode, sending energy through them.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral, Griplash, Fenox, and Starlight continue firing at the 
shields. Recklessa sees Lunarpine attacking an Alliance bot and flies 
toward him.

She aims at Lunarpine, firing several energy globs.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot's vision clears in time to see Proto swooping down on him. 
The Alliance bot brings up a hand and grabs Proto's leg, yanking the 
Maximal down. Proto smashes into Perndabot, sending both of them 
rolling on the ground.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster swears again as he watches the shields drop a full 6% from 
two of those energy missiles, along with several more precent from 
the energy weapons. He stands up.

"Slag this. The computer can take care of defences, I'm going out 
there to fight," he says to Chordate and walks out of the room. "Oh, 
and go ahead and activate the missiles," he says over his shoulder, 
arming him plasma rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex's still body shakes as the optic blasts hit it. Near him, 
Repressor's systems were trying to reboot.
